definition: used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
teacher/master/expert/model/army division/(old) troops/to dispatch troops
surname Shi
father
the master leads you to the door, the rest is up to you/you can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink
pinyin: shi1 fu5 ling3 jin4 men2 , xiu1 xing2 zai4 ge4 ren2
containing_words.word: 师父领进门，修行在个人

sentences.english: It is the last day of qi yue and our geomancer says it is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 那是七月的最后一天，风水师父说是个吉祥的日子。

sentences.english: I'll give you a message for your Master Shifu.
sentences.chinese: 那你也替我捎个信给你那个什么师父。

sentences.english: Monkey, seeing that the boy was actually a demon in disguise, told his master not to bother.
sentences.chinese: 悟空认出那是妖怪变的，叫师父少管闲事。

sentences.english: After having made arrangements for his master， Monkey left for the Plantain Cave to see Princess Iron Fan.
sentences.chinese: 司空把师父安排好，前往芭蕉洞找铁扇公主。

sentences.english: Of course I would go, I replied respectfully.
sentences.chinese: 我当然肯去，我恭敬地回禀师父。

sentences.english: If you get lost or muddle-headed, just ask me.
sentences.chinese: 就是你们在境界里迷糊了，有师父可以问呀。

sentences.english: He had lost his wife, and the Master assuaged his grief.
sentences.chinese: 他失去了妻子，师父减轻了他的悲痛。

sentences.english: She saw Gopala frequently entering the Master's body and again coming out of it.
sentences.chinese: 她看见哥帕拉不断地在师父的身体进进出出。

sentences.english: Bit by bit I put Master in the bag.
sentences.chinese: 我一点一点地将师父装进了我的钱包。

sentences.english: He found in the Master the embodiment of the Vedanta scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 他发现师父是吠檀多经文的具体表现。

sentences.english: It is a dynamic that provides a sharp contrast to the sometimes reckless teachings of her Master.
sentences.chinese: 这与她师父有时卤莽的教导形成了鲜明的对比。

sentences.english: My master was Abbot Xingzheng. I was born to a devout Buddhist family of several generations of believers.
sentences.chinese: 我师父是当时少林寺的住持，方丈行正老和尚。

sentences.english: I waited for her cremains by the ashes furnace.
sentences.chinese: 骨灰出炉前我们和火化师父说好在炉前等。

sentences.english: I'll tell Shifu he  has nothing to worry about.
sentences.chinese: 我会跟师父说，他没什么可担心的。

sentences.english: So, my master said, I am unsocial.
sentences.chinese: 所以，师父说我很不合群。

sentences.english: The pedagogue can't definitely deliberately lose again this period.
sentences.chinese: 这一次师父一定不会再失手。

definition: senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
apprentice/disciple
disciple/follower
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
term of respect for your teacher's wife
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
teacher/master
junior female student or apprentice/daughter (younger than oneself) of one's teacher
fellow apprentices/fellow students (male)
Taoist priest/Daoist priest
adoptive father
to formally become an apprentice to a master
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square)/monastic room 10 feet square/Buddhist or Daoist abbot/abbot's chamber
Buddhist monk
